EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Follow up on Survery (1493046415.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - 98 Clean DocumentEmail false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Daniel- I wanted to bring this to the top of your inbox. Would you be interested in a 30 minute meeting? Based on your survey answers I really think Turbonomic could be interesting and worth discussing! Let me know if you have availability this week! Thank you, Katie NorchiSales Development RepresentativeO: 857.305.4618 C: 440.708.8477500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116 From: Kathleen Norchi Sent: Monday, April 17, 2017 11:30 AM To: 'daniel.eliades@duffandphelps.com' <daniel.eliades@duffandphelps.com> Subject: Follow up on Survery Hi Dan,Thank you for completing the Turbonomic Cloud Readiness Survey! You should receive your Amazon Gift Card shortly.I can offer you another $100 Amazon Gift Card if I can schedule 30 minutes between you and a Turbonomic Engineer. You indicated on your survey several Cloud Readiness challenges that Turbonomic directly addresses, specifically reducing costs, and preparing you to migrate to the cloud in the mot cloud effective manner. - Rightsizing on-premises workloads in preparation for cloud migration - Turbonomic has been proven to reduce infrastructure requirements by 30% or more through intelligent rightsizing; it can calculate precisely the set of cloud templates your current workloads require to assure performance in the cloud - Planning and/or modeling migration - Turbonomic can calculate precisely the set of cloud templates your current workloads require to assure performance in the cloud, and also determine their real-time cost - Visibility into existing cloud-based workloads - Turbonomic provides you with visibility into the inventory and resource consumption of every workload your organization is running in the cloud - Reducing cloud costs and budget overrun - Turbonomic has been proven to reduce cloud bills by 30% or more through intelligent rightsizing - Enforcing cloud cost governance and budget adherence - Turbonomic has been proven to reduce cloud bills by 30% or more through intelligent rightsizing, and its policy engine permits you to set a budget allowance on each cloud account - Reduce capital expenditures - Turbonomic has been proven to reduce infrastructure requirements by 30% or more through intelligent consolidation - Reduce operational expenditures - Turbonomic has been proven to decrease performance alerts by 80% or more through its patented automation engine Do you have some time to speak today? To receive your gift card, you must schedule your consultation within the next 7 days and complete it before May 1st. If, after our call, you decide to evaluate Turbonomic as a solution, we will make a donation in your name of $1,000 to any charity of your choice.Thank you,Katie Katie NorchiSales Development RepresentativeO: 857.305.4618 C: 440.708.8477500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116
